timeline.message:
Add guards to guard unguarded traces

In the code there are places where unguarded tracing occurs causing
an output into a log file when no trace flags are specified.
This commit adds guards to stop the unguarded tracing.

Signed-off-by: Andrew Gao <andrewgao98@gmail.com>
Signed-off-by: Abdulrahman Alattas <rmnattas@gmail.com>

Add guards to unguarded traces

timeline.bodyText: Can we make these private member functions and just use trace() to avoid the complexity of additional parameters? Similarly for other functions modified.
timeline.author: fjeremic

replies.bodyText:
Fixed additional parameter in 4a94f30
As we talked today, they weren't made private member functions because they are called from other functions.
replies.author: rmnattas
